name: SWAPP Protocol
description: SWAPP Protocol is a **MultiChain** smart Contract that has been launched on **Ethereum (ERC-20)** and **Binance Smart Chain (BEP-20)**. SWAPP is a decentralized, fairly launched, ETH and BNB paired utility token used to both facilitate yield farming rewards in the SWAPP DeFi platform as well as serve as the form of rewards within the SWAPP smartphone app and browser extensions. The purpose of the SWAPP Token is two-sided (yes, like a coin!): The DeFi Launch - The initial purpose of SWAPP is to create a thriving DeFi ecosystem consisting of token holders who can participate in various forms of yield farming and who will ultimately become founding users of the forthcoming SWAPP mobile app. The SWAPP Mobile App - Upon launch of the subsequent SWAPP mobile app, users will then enjoy powerful, new features including turn-key data monetization and privacy-enhancing capabilities.
